downloadDescription: This walkthrough guide is designed to provide a step-by-step overview of Microsoft® SharePoint® 2010.
detailsSection: This guide was written as a companion to the SharePoint Server 2010 Evaluation Guide for Technical and Business Decision Makers.  We recommend reading that evaluation guide first, because it provides a tour of the new and improved features in the areas of collaboration, social computing, enterprise content management, search, business intelligence and composite applications.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Required Software:

    • PDFor XPS file reader: The documents in this download is provided in PDF file format and XPS file format, and requires a PDF or XPS reader, depending on the format you choose.
installInstructionSection: Download the walkthrough guide in either PDF or XPS format, and read it with a PDF or XPS reader, depending on the format you choose.
